name: Green Slime
description: A small, gelatinous creature that can dissolve into water and slip through tight spaces. Remarkably adaptable, it can learn any ability. It's stats are typically low - but this one seems unbelievably strong! Slimes reproduce via mitosis: it partially invades a victim's womb, then splits in two - one half says in the womb, the other half. stays outside where it was.

traits.name: Bludgeon
traits.description: A more skillful attack, reaching out with a tentacle to strike
